content: of round round 7 *k6* repeat to end of round round 8 *p3 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 9 *k2 k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 45 50 55 60 total stitches round 10 *p2 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 11 *k1 k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 36 40 44 48 total stitches round 12 *p1 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 13 *k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 27 30 33 36 total stitches round 14 *sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 15 *ssk k1* repeat to end of round there are now 18 20 22 24 total stitches round 16 *sl1 p1* repeat to end of round round 17 *ssk * repeat to end of round there are now 9 10 11 12 total stitches round 18 *ssk* across all remaining stitches knit 1 0 1 0 break yarn and weave yarn tail through remaining 5 5 6 6 stitches and tighten to close the top weave in all ends block as desired all pattern elements written and graphic copyright megan williams 2013 please do not reproduce redistribute or sell the pattern see stockinette zombies designs for more patterns weather the weather hat - page 4 of 4 decreases ending after row 23 chart is the same as the crown decreases after row 23 written directions round 1 *ssk k6* repeat to end of round there are now 63 70 77 84 total stitches round 2 *sl1 p6* repeat to end of round round 3 *k7* repeat to end of round round 4 *sl1 p6* repeat to end of round round 5 *ssk k5* repeat to end of round there are now 54 60 66 72 total stitches round 6 *sl1 p5* repeat to end of round round 7 *k6* repeat to end of round round 8 *sl1 p5* repeat to end of round round 9 *ssk k4* repeat to end of round there are now 45 50 55 60 total stitches round 10 *sl1 p4* repeat to end of round round 11 *ssk k3* repeat to end of round there are now 36 40 44 48 total stitches round 12 *sl1 p3* repeat to end of round round 13 *ssk k2* repeat to end of round there are now 27 30 33 36 total stitches round 14 *sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 15 *ssk k1* repeat to end of round there are now 18 20 22 24 total stitches round 16 *sl1 p1* repeat to end of round round 17 *ssk * repeat to end of round there are now 9 10 11 12 total stitches round 18 *ssk* across all remaining stitches knit 1 0 1 0 break yarn and weave yarn tail through remaining 5 5 6 6 stitches and tighten to close the top weave in all ends block as desired all pattern elements written and graphic copyright
